publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2591 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Judiciary and Courts (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Judiciary and Courts (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 4: 35 minutes Groups 5 to 7: 1 hour 5 minutes. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
